name: Ponzu-Ginger Dipping Sauce
description: This no-cook dipping sauce features ponzu, the citrus- and soy-spiked Japanese sauce, that's enlivened with ginger, scallions, and sesame oil. It's reminiscent of teriyaki, but substantially more complex. Try it with dumplings, simply cooked chicken, or steamed or roasted fish.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine ponzu, scallions, ginger, mirin, sesame oil, and salt. Serve.
